body_html: @Androbin I don't think we need to include the kernel_tests directories, since those should be purely test code that doesn't need to be included in the PIP package. (Indeed, we probably include too much test code in the current wildcards, and it would be nice to prune it if possible.)
body_text: @Androbin I don't think we need to include the kernel_tests directories, since those should be purely test code that doesn't need to be included in the PIP package. (Indeed, we probably include too much test code in the current wildcards, and it would be nice to prune it if possible.)
body: @Androbin I don't think we need to include the `kernel_tests` directories, since those should be purely test code that doesn't need to be included in the PIP package. (Indeed, we probably include too much test code in the current wildcards, and it would be nice to prune it if possible.)
